definitions.text: fall or descend to a lower place or level

examples: The Japanese sank American ships in Pearl Harbor

definitions.text: pass into a specified state or condition

examples: The raft sank and its occupants drowned

definitions.text: descend into or as if into some soft substance or place

examples: The sun dipped below the horizon
The setting sun sank below the tree line

definitions.text: fall heavily or suddenly; decline markedly
examples: The real estate market fell off
She sank her fingers into the soft sand
He buried his head in her lap
hunger gave their faces a sunken look
